text: tatha (he nabee!) aap unaka nirnay useese karen, jo allaah ne utaara hai aur unakee manamaanee par na chalen tatha unase saavadhaan rahen ki aapako jo allaah ne aapakee or utaara hai, usamen se kuchh se pher na den. phir yadi ve munh pheren, to jaan len ki allaah chaahata hai ki unake kuchh paapon ke kaaran unhen dand de. vaastav mein, bahut-se log ullanghanakaaree hain
